name: Brockley Combe Manor

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is what the WOW factor is all about - luxurious rooms, fantastic setting & warm & friendly hosts. We stayed here one night before catching an early flight from Bristol airport. The room was huge with three large sofas, massive curved window seat, fantastic views across the valley & an enormous bed. The bathroom was just as extravagant with a wonderful free standing bath & walk in shower. We were disappointed that we could not stay longer to enjoy it all. We highly recommend this bed & breakfast & will definitely be staying again!!
reviews.title: Fantastic!!!!

reviews.text: What a place! the main room was Huge! great views of bristol channel. very helpful and friendly hostess. Even contacted the week before going to check details. For a family of 4 this is the best bed and breakfast I have been to with a separate room for our 2 children with plenty of space for them as well. We will be back!
reviews.title: Hidden gem

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here for just one night whilst attending a wedding locally. Wish it could have been longer and allowed time to really enjoy the house and grounds. Excellent in every regard with welcoming host. Highly recommended. A superb find with amazing accomadation
reviews.title: What a lovely place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room sizes in this luxury bed and breakfast are unbelievable, sheer opulence. We had a massive 4 poster and three large sofas in our room. The Bathroom was also enormous witha huge walk in power waterfall shower, large bath and double washbasins. Highly recommended. Continental breakfast, cereal, toast, ham and cheese, yogurts and croissants. Rachel the owner is most helpful too.
reviews.title: Fantastic Rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed there recently 14th July, Rachel was at the door to greet us along with her husband to which we found extremely warm and welcoming. We were shown to our room which was amazing. They asked what time we would like breakfast to which was a great continental breakfast plenty to eat to include hot croissants. I would recommend anyone to stay. Rachel and Andy leaves to it but are on hand if you need any assistance.
reviews.title: Relaxing and Tranquil

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Amazing location, stunning rooms and excellent service!
reviews.title: Absolute gem, you'd be a fool not to stay here!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I can't really fault this hotel in anyway, it was simply wonderful. It's a beautiful old building and the decor inside is superb.
reviews.title: Amazing!!!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms were huge and spacious, ours had two lovely big window seats looking across the 'estate'. Breakfast was more than adequate and although no English breakfast was on offer (which I never eat anyway) the continental/buffet breakfast was superb, you won't go hungry.
reviews.title: Quite simply staggering!

reviews.text: If you are a guest to the UK and arriving/using Bristol airport, you would be foolish not to stay here. It would give you an amazing opportunity to stay in a 'English Stately Home' and have something far more exciting to talk about when you get back home than staying in one of the many boring chain hotels. It really does take you back to another era.
reviews.title: Lovely place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It was a £12.50 taxi fare to the airport which, taking into account the more than reasonable cost of the room, made it very competitive on price.
reviews.title: Extraordinary........but in a good way

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I agree with Paolo P it is the biggest room we have stayed in and agree with his comments completely.We will be back ASAP! The view is fantastic and we also spotted a deer.The drive up from the main road leads you through a woodland canopy then opens up to reveal a stunning location.Watch out for the speed humps you can pick them out easier at night.A spot of white paint in the middle would help Andy.Cheers
reviews.title: Brilliant

reviews.text: This was an incredible experience!....My room(s) had to be the biggest that I have ever stayed in.
reviews.title: I've discovered a real gem!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nothing was too much trouble an there was a real personal feel about the place.
reviews.title: Wonderful
Amazing!
reviews.text: the room was huge with an add on dressing room(this was bigger than some rooms I have stayed in!) and a luxury bathroom.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I was not sure whether to put a review on trip advisor...or keep this place a well kept secret for my friends and family!!!
reviews.title: WOW!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for one night before our early flight from Bristol. The bedroom was very large and spacious as was the bathroom. It was beautifully furnished and I loved the large free standing bath.The service was fantastic it is just a pity we had to leave really early and missed the breakfast. We would definitely stay here again as it was great value for money and not far from the airport.
reviews.title: Beautiful Manor and spacious rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We only stayed one night in this lovely Manor House and would have liked to stay longer, We were on our way to Cornwall via Cyprus.
reviews.title: Wonderful Stay in a lovely Manor House

reviews.text: Beautiful location in the countryside, huge bedroom, lovely breakfast and very helpful host. If we are ever in this area again we would love to come back for another hopefully longer stay.
reviews.title: This B&B exceeds all expectations
anticipating a wonderful stay
reviews.text: Nick and Lorna. North Cyprus
Truly Brockley Coombe Manor exceeds expectations.
reviews.title: Don't really want to share......

description: We like to think that Brockley Combe Manor is amongst one of the best bed and breakfast establishments in the UK. Our rooms have a real wow factor without being pretentious or gimmicky. The property is well positioned for the airport, rail links and motorways but is in a quiet and beautiful position just 6 miles from Bristol City center.
